content: ilona is the third floral granny square in the welcoming blanket 1 a mystery crochet along for a throw blanket made up of nine 12 floral granny square patterns with borders ilona has an 8-petal flower at the center which is similar to the stop and smell the flowers granny square 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop only includes link to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces crocheting in the third loop only includes video tutorial special stitch pattern fpdc includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern special stitch pattern decrease includes written instructions and linked photo tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 60 yd 55 m in ca 55 yd 50 5 m in cb and 30 yd 27 5 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* clover amour us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge** through round 8 in pattern = 6 25 16 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/24/welcoming-blanket-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2019/07/12/crochet-pattern-stop-smell-flowers-granny-square/ 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/06/14/crochet-pattern-ilona-floral-granny-square/
